RosÃ © s are generally made from red grapes ; however , unlike typical red wine production , the skins are removed from the juice after only a couple of days .This limited skin contact gives rosÃ © its light pink color and is the reason that rosÃ © s are lighter - bodied than most red wines .

This book shares the adventures of author Jamie Ivey , his wife Tanya , and their friend Peter as they leave their comfortable lives in London to open a rosÃ © -only wine bar in the south of France .Jamie , Tanya , and Peter had spent the previous summer searching for Franceâ€ ™ s palest rosÃ © which was the subject of Iveyâ€ ™ s first book , Extremely Pale RosÃ © .
